title: FIRST: European research for web information extraction and analysis for supporting financial decision making

author: Tomás Pariente Lobo, Atos Research & Innovation, Atos Origin

segmentation: So thank you, I'm Thomas, printed from Otto, Spain.
I'm the coordinator of the first project.

What can be helpful for so for other organizations regarding the research we're doing?

Don't take into account really match the understanding information coming from, especially web resources so.

When Steve Jobs announced the the iPhone back in 2007.

It was news at the time, but in the previous year in 2006 especially, there were several indicators of their news out there that were explaining that something would happen in the near future regarding this iPhone, so.

If there there was a tool at a time that could cope with this unstructured news, we can have some hints that the announcement would be soon and then the price is probably will increase about the Apple stock.
So this is an example of how having a tool that is analyzing also an asset resource that could help at that time to prepare for CDs, increase the value of April Apple.
